void phys::WorldNode::IncrementOrbit ( Real  Radians  ) 

Increments the orbit of this node if this is an orbiting node.

This function has no effect if this isn't an orbiting node.

Parameters:
Radians A real reprsenting the amount of orbit to increment in radians.

Definition at line 180 of file worldnode.cpp.

void phys::WorldNode::SetAutoTracking ( WorldNode *  node,
Vector3  Offset = Vector3() 
)

Makes this node autotrack another node.

This function will make this node update it's orientation every frame automatically so that it's always facing the target node.

Parameters:
node The node to be tracked.
Offset A vector3 representing the offset from the nodes location to be tracked.

Definition at line 185 of file worldnode.cpp.

void phys::WorldNode::SetAutoTracking ( ActorBase *  Actor,
Vector3  Offset = Vector3() 
)

Makes this node autotrack an actor.

This function will make this node update it's orientation every frame automatically so that it's always facing the target actor.

Parameters:
Actor The actor to be tracked.
Offset A vector3 representing the offset from the actor's location to be tracked.

Sets the type of node that this is.
